comments.content:
Some enemies have text which reads " After (name) engages a player..." (or some such)

- does this apply when a player chooses to engage that enemy?

dj2.0 said:

Some enemies have text which reads " After (name) engages a player..." (or some such)

- does this apply when a player chooses to engage that enemy?



yes, so hummerhorns still gives you 5 damage!!
